title: HP Land Revenue Act
details:
Governs Revenue Officers (Patwari/Tehsildar) and Revenue Collection.
Key Sections: Sec 32 (RoR), Sec 34 (Report Acquisition), Sec 35 (Mutation), Sec 16 (Partition).

title: HP Tenancy & Land Reforms Act
details:
Gave rights to tenants.
Section 118: Restricts non-agriculturists from buying land in HP without Govt permission.
Reform: Abolished intermediaries (Zamindars).

title: Other Key Acts
details:
PESA Act 1996: Tribal rights & Gram Sabha powers.
MGNREGA: 100-120 days wage employment (Patwari verifies land).
